title: Overhaul all site content and docs for Korporus
description: Rewrite all marketing and feature content for Korporus and implement markdown-driven docs ingestion from /docs into website docs routes and navigation.

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Completed Korporus content rewrite across marketing pages and video XML drafts; implemented markdown-driven docs ingestion from /docs with sectioned IA and legacy docs route compatibility.
